publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6561 Alasdair Allan: Crossroads (Harris)—That the Parliament congratulates Crossroads (Harris) on being named as Scottish Charity of Year at the Scottish Charity Awards 2010; notes that the scheme also recently received an excellent grading from the Care Commission for the second year in succession; recognises that this is a lifeline organisation working to deliver care at home to older, sick and disabled people and their carers on the isle of Harris; further notes that, now in its 25th year, Crossroads (Harris) provided 2,844 hours of care and support during the year to those who need it, and wishes all the staff, volunteers and members of the community involved in supporting Crossroads (Harris) well for the future of the organisation. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-6561 Crossroads (Harris) (lodged on 11 June 2010) Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, John Wilson*, Maureen Watt*
